te

IIet as I aero ktor Szom me I nguori miegs nog moti iesen of boog si MI

VITS

lo ai bogeorg

Oy so woy etsiut signos em to

mow mor "202 betsti

Begbied no aeg neds vas esi 'mod

tefquos ad vom tu* I do iw ,KTOV0001

Tutut ad mi

peruut een on a brouzda o of sing me I tsalt est et $1,9Y

.aoquiug erf 101

neede 10 evsel aley Ben bewofis evad eest enyt edes

-oggo berteeb ynol ed om detetu? bluesr "Sex an tsatt begon VIdents, bed I

os neque at plotso

bao

? yrism avsd I tsrt se? I won 870

VNOS

put to doser lo two vilodwed of you

mee ev[ovek bivou get s dowe do istw

tuods zeitlib dw llenyi aetao ot eve It Ist so? I bas , sioodtog og

.Com

ogreso est II

YOU BETT "WO

Toywsa . eonst

e oreads ym gatud

to lo red von wo

09 98 aega mn erotetores bobned ever I do dw about 1o.

fel 'mod

.ebut berispor art wokabasa edist

og pasy i midot terib koer

fon od IIIW noid agildo erlt tans beilaltsa me I 101 , te vewod NOV VYTOW zettament

edt bus vapenexe sutxe cost of ber yfdedorg ovari mox won fout

howBee sub ni

erevee $id s need aver faum acete

teu i

ev Loode wen edt 101 sede iw boog tesitused vm $qeos onse IS

muter I met

wOV see viisut os tons ! Nov mot sed of sgod Ilse I

gainego

Very sincerely yours, * .5.2. 100m2 envaw idzoM ASS saibI slogas u seb VM 30 nom eft om bedoen doldw, te OV statoegge kIqseb I IIet as I aero ktor Szom me I nguori miegs nog moti iesen of boog si MI -98CAN VILes faydg need evad neviete I slow. bis done bedovs boy fant soy VITS lo ai bogeorg Oy so woy etsiut signos em to mow mor "202 betsti Begbied no aeg neds vas esi 'mod tefquos ad vom tu* I do iw ,KTOV0001 Tutut ad mi peruut een on a brouzda o of sing me I tsalt est et $1,9Y .aoquiug erf 101 neede 10 evsel aley Ben bewofis evad eest enyt edes -oggo berteeb ynol ed om detetu? bluesr "Sex an tsatt begon VIdents, bed I DWO Woy bns ransey neetit 7o? boviſ vi bna yar erensibn1 tielv of vt inst os neque at plotso bao ? yrism avsd I tsrt se? I won 870 VNOS put to doser lo two vilodwed of you mee ev[ovek bivou get s dowe do istw tuods zeitlib dw llenyi aetao ot eve It Ist so? I bas , sioodtog og .Com ogreso est II YOU BETT "WO Toywsa . eonst e oreads ym gatud to lo red von wo 09 98 aega mn erotetores bobned ever I do dw about 1o. fel 'mod .ebut berispor art wokabasa edist og pasy i midot terib koer fon od IIIW noid agildo erlt tans beilaltsa me I 101 , te vewod NOV VYTOW zettament edt bus vapenexe sutxe cost of ber yfdedorg ovari mox won fout howBee sub ni erevee $id s need aver faum acete teu i ev Loode wen edt 101 sede iw boog tesitused vm $qeos onse IS muter I met wOV see viisut os tons ! Nov mot sed of sgod Ilse I gainego

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter expressing regret for Luk's injury and stating he will go abroad on a one-year leave. He had hoped to visit India and China, but due to financial contraints, he will be in Europe. James C. Sawyer, Treasurer, will be in charge of funding in the agent account.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
